title: Chaim Gross (Sculpture Art Ebook).pdf
description:
H. N. Abrams | 1974 | Pdf | Eng | ISBN10 0810901609 | 235 pag | 36.1 MB

WHETHER CARVED IN WOOD, CHISELED IN STONE, Or cast in bronze, the beautiful sculptures of Chaim Gross have a special appeal. It is not surprising that they are found in leading museums and important private collections in this country and broad. This artist's versatility as to material is matched by his range of scale; he is as much at home in marble as in ebony, in the monumental as in the miniature. Indeed, his larger than-life bronzes, commissioned by numerous public and private institutions, today make their statement in many outdoor settingsÃ¢â‚¬â€on the hills of Jerusalem, on the plains of Kansas, in the gardens of Berkeley, in teeming New York City
